issue.title: [C++] Do not hard code the "v" part of versions in thirdparty toolchain
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3252](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3252). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When I changed Flatbuffers from "v1.8.0" to a git hash, it broke the dependency download script. We should move all the version string to versions.txt rather than having some "v${FOO_URL}" in ThirdpartyToolchain.cmake
